name: susie rogers' reading mitts
notes:
this is the old susie's reading mitts from dancing ewe yarns (now closed) updated and added by the original designer, susie rogers, for people to enjoy.

this pattern is also available in french translation [here][1].


  [1]: http://nini-naphtaline.blogspot.com/2009/12/les-tutos-les-tutos-les-tutos.html
for people having trouble with the lace pattern on the small and large sizes the following changes can be made to make the stitch count come out even.
round 6:  on the last three stitches, slip 1, k2tog, pass slip st over.
round 7:  increase one stitch.

the pattern is now available in polish http://yellowmleczyk.blogspot.com/2015/10/prezencik-wzor-na-mitsy.html.
pattern is now available in korean
